Baking is one of my favourite things but sometimes you can have perfect results but sometimes they can look like this:

Here is my recipe for omelette: You will need: ÔÅä

  • Two eggs
  • Pepper
  • Salt
  • Milk
  • Cheese
  • Butter
  • Ham
  • Fork
  • Bread
  • Spatula
  • Knife
  • Chopping board
  • A clean kitchen
  • Jug
  • First light the stove and put some butter on so it makes the pan greasy.
  • Start by cracking to eggs into the jug.
  • Use the lid of the milk to measure the milk in, add four of those into the jug.
  • Start to whisk the mixture with the fork.
  • Then add some salt and pepper.
  • Pour the mixture into the pan.
  • Wait a few minutes for the edges to set.
  • If there are any runny bits pick the pan up and swirl it about.
  • There it should be set by now and put your fillings on one half of the omelette.
  • Fold the omelette in two and make sure the edges are secure.
  • It is supposed to look golden so flip and let the other side become golden.
  • While that is happening put some bread in the toaster and wait for it to pop.
  • The omelette should be completely golden so put it on a plate and sprinkle some cheese on top.
  • Your toast should be popped so turn your oven on to a fan and put your omelette inside to keep it warm.
  • Next you must butter your toast and put it on a separate plate. Lift out your omelette and enjoy
  • Lift out your omelette and enjoy.
